title: Prosciutto, Melon, and Figs
source: My Kitchen in Rome - Rachel Roddy
categories: My Kitchen in Rome - Rachel Roddy
directions: Cut the melon in half, scoop out the seeds, slice it into 1-inch-thick wedges, and pare away the rind. Cut the figs in half. Arrange the melon, figs, and prosciutto on a large platter and serve.
